text:
Is it not possible to set inherited_value for specific values within a *border field*? I get the following error if I don't have all 4 values (width, opacity, style, color) set in the default:
`[ERROR] border field at path borders has an invalid default value`

And if I try to add an inherited_value with property_value_paths I get the following error:
`[ERROR] Cannot deserialize value of type `java.lang.String` from Object value (token `JsonToken.START_OBJECT`) (line:-1, column:-1)`
